text: Mitrvinda was the sister of Vind Anuvind the king of Ujjain.
She had a desire to get Lord as her husband.
But her brother, Vind Anuvind was a follower of Duryodhan.
So he stopped his sister Mitrvinda from getting married to Krishna.
But Krishna eloped with Mitrvinda from the his court and got married to her formally later on.
title: Lord’s Marriage with Mitrvinda
